## Pyrubi 3.1.0> Powerful, easy and modern Rubika API library for building self bots.[![Downloads](https://static.pepy.tech/badge/pyrubi)](https://pepy.tech/project/pyrubi)
### Install or Update:``` bashpip install -U pyrubi```
### Quick start:``` pythonfrom pyrubi import Clientclient = Client(session="mySelf")for message in client.on_message(): print(message.text) if message.text == "hello": message.reply("**hello** __from__ ##pyrubi##")```also you can enter your session data manually:```pythonfrom pyrubi import Clientauth_key = "abcdefghijklnopkrstuvwxyzazxcqwe"private_key = "-----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----\n..."client = Client(auth=auth_key, private=private_key)for message in client.on_message(): print(message.text) if message.text == "hello": message.reply("**hello** __from__ ##pyrubi##")```
### Features: - **Fast** : *The requests are very fast and optimize.*- **Easy** : *All methods and features are designed as easy and optimal as possible*- **Powerful** : *While the library is simple, it has high speed and features that make your work easier and faster*
